answers.answer: i feel ur frustration. iam 35 weeks and only seen my actual doctor 3 times no lie! for about 5 minutes each time he just comes in says hi asks me if i have any questions and then leaves... its always just nurses who do the procedures i need done when i got to the obgyn. I know for a fact he dosent remember me or know anything about me. yet hes the one whos gonna delivery my baby :( its really upsetting
I honestly feel I strong almost uncontrollable urge to get her out. :( all I can do is cry

You may be measuring smaller because your baby has possibly dropped and may be engaged.  I wouldnt appreciate feeling that way either. My midwife remembered me from over a year ago when i had my son.  Sounds like you got a ****** midwife.....thsres always a few bad apples

iam sry. i cannot wait to go into labour either iam so damn tired and annoyed when i go to bed at night its like its a party for her in my tummy her kicks hurt so bad i cry. Sometimes i feel like i dont love her as horrible as that sounds i feel like she hurts me on purpose or sumthing but we both know babies dont know what there doing in there its not her fault :/ but i feel ur pain lol just remember ur not alone theres so many pregnant women out there who probably feel just like u
Crap. Is there any way you could get a new doctor for the last couple weeks
I wish but I doubt anyone will take me now!

Youd be surprised if you check into getting another doctor who is available.. sounds like anybody is better then who you currently have.. Id deff call and see it doesnt hurt.. i wouldnt want to be stressed out before the baby getting here.. nows the time to be relaxing and becoming confident in your birth plan
Im going to try and look into it tomorrow this is crazy I shouldn't be going through this at 36 weeks!! I'm constantly contracting less than 5 mins apart how can I get them stronger?

I feel you on this. My dont like my doc at all. I went to an app yesterday and I was there for 5 hours due to her stupidity... I got so mad i just wanted to slap her I regret ever choosing her to be my doc. But being 37 weeks already it would be impossible to switch doctors right now... I really wish I could though!
I don't think anyone will take me either especially with me having diabetes :/

If she measured your belly that's not accurate at determining how big your baby is. My ob doesn't measure fundal height as he says its pointless. He gives ultrasounds every appt to check growth, etc. Even ultrasounds aren't accurate at determining weight. My son was supposedly five pounds ten ounces at 35w6d. I had him two days later and he was 6lbs 12oz.So try not to worry. It does sound like you need to try to find another dr or midwife. They can generally fax over your medical records to the new dr. It wouldn't hurt to see if you can find someone.

I go for a non stress test here in a little bit I'm going to see what they have to say they honestly seem like they know more about what's going on and I know it'll be a long shot on finding a new doctor because where I'm from they induce early if you have gestational diabetes so really I'd only have another doctor for 2 weeks but I can't take this. This is my first pregnancy it should be a good experience and I should know more about what's going on.

question: I swear if I wasn't already 36 weeks I would switch doctor/midwifes I'm so upset my midwife knows nothing about me or my baby!!! My last appointment she forgot I had gestational diabetes btw I had already been diagnosed with it for almost 3 weeks!! Then this appointment she measures me and says I'm measuring 32 weeks the same as I was at my appointment two weeks ago and tells me that weird with me being diabetic.......ummm ya think I'm 36 weeks my baby is measuring 4 weeks behind!!!!!!! Well I had a ultrasound sound about 2 weeks ago so I ask her how it looked she forgot I had one and hadn't reviewed it yet she had no clue I have been having contractions at every non stress test and I know they tell her cause she tells them what to do when I'm having them which shows after 9 months this woman still has no clue who I am!!!! Really she's the person I'm relying on to help me get my baby here safe and she seems absolutely clueless about everything!! I honestly just want my daughter out I feel like she's no longer safe inside me she's measuring small and obviously not getting what she needs from me and the woman who is supposed to have the answers and help me understand seems at clueless as I am!! I dunno what to do anymore I just want to cry!!!
title: i want my daughter out of me vent
